security.settingsDescription: Manage your security and privacy settings
security.passwordSettingsDescription: Change your password and manage password security
security.twoFactorAuthDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account
security.enableTwoFactorDescription: Require a verification code when logging in
security.recoveryOptionsDescription: Set up recovery methods in case you lose access
security.sessionManagementDescription: Manage your active sessions and devices
security.privacySettingsDescription: Control how your data is used and shared
security.shareUsageDataDescription: Help us improve by sharing anonymous usage data
security.allowProfilingDescription: Allow us to analyze your usage patterns to improve your experience
security.allowThirdPartySharingDescription: Allow us to share your data with trusted third parties
security.allowLocationTrackingDescription: Allow us to track your location for location-based features
security.allowCookiesDescription: Allow us to store cookies on your device
security.allowMarketingEmailsDescription: Receive marketing emails about our products and services
security.allowPersonalizationDescription: Allow us to personalize your experience based on your preferences
security.dataManagementDescription: Manage your personal data and account
security.exportDataDescription: Download a copy of your personal data
security.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
security.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
security.deleteAccountConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
security.privacySettingsSavedDescription: Your privacy settings have been updated successfully.
security.privacySettingsErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your privacy settings. Please try again.
security.dataExportSuccessDescription: Your data export has been initiated. You will receive a download link shortly.
security.dataExportErrorDescription: There was a problem exporting your data. Please try again.
security.accountDeletedSuccessDescription: Your account has been successfully deleted.
security.accountDeletedErrorDescription: There was a problem deleting your account. Please try again.
security.notificationPreferencesDescription: Control which security notifications you receive
security.loginNotificationsDescription: Receive notifications when someone logs into your account
security.passwordChangeNotificationsDescription: Receive notifications when your password is changed
security.dataBreachAlertsDescription: Receive notifications if your data is involved in a breach
security.auditLogDescription: View a record of security-related events and activities

integrations.currentIntegrationsDescription: View and manage your active integrations
integrations.addNewDescription: Connect to a new external system or service

integrations.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this integration? This action cannot be undone.
integrations.addSuccessDescription: The integration has been added successfully.
integrations.addErrorDescription: There was a problem adding the integration. Please try again.
integrations.testErrorDescription: The integration test failed. Please check your configuration.
integrations.deleteSuccessDescription: The integration has been deleted successfully.
integrations.deleteErrorDescription: There was a problem deleting the integration. Please try again.
integrations.updateErrorDescription: There was a problem updating the integration. Please try again.
integrations.activateSuccessDescription: The integration has been activated successfully.
integrations.deactivateSuccessDescription: The integration has been deactivated successfully.
integrations.loadErrorDescription: There was a problem loading the integrations. Please try again.

feedback.dialogDescription: Help us improve by sharing your thoughts, suggestions, or reporting issues.

feedback.isPublicDescription: Allow other users to see and upvote this feedback
feedback.submitErrorDescription: There was a problem submitting your feedback. Please try again.
feedback.updateSuccessDescription: Your feedback has been updated successfully.
feedback.dashboardDescription: View and manage feedback from users
feedback.addResponseDescription: Share your thoughts on this feedback
feedback.responsesDescription: View and add responses to this feedback
feedback.responseSubmitSuccessDescription: Your response has been added successfully.
feedback.responseSubmitErrorDescription: There was a problem submitting your response. Please try again.
feedback.loadResponsesErrorDescription: There was a problem loading the responses. Please try again.
